messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Cursed Communion. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Cursed Communion have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Cursed Communion. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be a Robust Softdrinks.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Cursed Communion. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Cursed Communion. We apologize for the inconvenience.
